<title level="1" right="Hazard 12" pfs="">[Polymorph Trap](/Hazards.aspx?ID=14)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 525 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A Druidic glyph tries to transform a trespasser into an animal.

---

**Stealth**
DC 34 (trained)

**Disable**
[Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) DC 32 (master) to drain the glyph’s power harmlessly, or [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (6th level; counteract DC 30) to counteract the glyph

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Baleful Polymorph** <actions string="Reaction" /> (primal, transmutation); **Trigger** A creature moves within 30 feet of the glyph without speaking the passphrase in Druidic. **Effect** The creature is targeted by [_baleful polymorph_](/Spells.aspx?ID=17) (DC 32 Will save).
